shortdesc.ph: Used to configure the parameters of a specific layer in a multi-layer video stream.

section.p: This structure is used to configure the parameters of a specific layer in a multi-layer video stream, including resolution, frame rate, and whether to enable the video stream of this layer.

ul.li: : Enables the video stream of the current layer.
: (Default) Disables the video stream of the current layer.
: Enables the corresponding layer of the multi-layer video stream.
: (Default) Disables the corresponding layer of the multi-layer video stream.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable the corresponding layer of the video stream. The default value is .
: Enables the corresponding layer of the video stream.
: (Default) Does not enable the corresponding layer of the video stream.
